alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 07 at 2:02AM MST until January 07 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, with higher amounts of 8 to 12 inches above 7500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Fredonia and Jacob Lake. * WHEN...Until noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Additional snow forecast from 1 AM Today to noon Today: Fredonia 3 to 5 inches Jacob Lake 4 to 6 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
